name: 8 horrible malfunctions
description:
A game where the theme is overridden all the time (with past SGJ Themes!). Each theme comes with its own fast paced ability. See how fast you can make it to the end!

Controls
A/D:         Move
Space:     Jump
Enter:      Ability (changes with theme)

Contributions:
Tilesets + explosion sound + jump (not hop) sound are internet packages.
Everything else is self made.
